name: After School Program - Louis Sutter
description: Our after school program is an experience that provides a safe and nurturing environment for youth in grades K-5 to develop life long recreation and leisure skills. Participants will receive homework assistance, be exposed to an environment that will promote literacy, encourage communication and empowerment skills while providing recreation activities that include sports, group games, arts and culture, community exploration and seasonal special events. All staff and volunteers receive background

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900 Online Reservations
cost: This is a fee based service.
